short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zipprr Color Picker extension will allow you to pick colors from any webpage with a click of button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a user-friendly color picker Chrome extension designed to simplify your color selection process! This intuitive tool allows you to effortlessly pick colors from any webpage with just a click.

Whether you're a designer, developer, or simply someone who loves colors, this extension makes it easy to capture and save hex color codes for your projects.

With a sleek interface and seamless functionality, you can quickly identify and utilize colors that inspire you. Enhance your creative workflow and ensure you never miss the perfect shade again.
